code: @Manual{,   title = {sparseNumeric: Sparse Numeric Vector Class and Methods},   author = {Mason Reed},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/masoncancode/sparseNumeric}, }

what: Sparse Numeric Vector Class and Methods
title: Sparse Numeric Vector Class and Methods
text: sparseNumeric provides S4 sparse numeric vector class, sparse_numeric, storing mostly-zero numeric vectors. package includes methods : Computing means without materializing dense vectors. Computing Euclidean norms. Standardizing vectors (center scale) modeling.

title: Sparse Numeric Vector Class and Methods
text: can install development version GitHub repository online: ```r # install.packages(“remotes”) remotes::install_github(“masoncancode/sparseNumeric”)

what: Mean of a sparse_numeric vector — mean,sparse_numeric-method
title: Mean of a sparse_numeric vector — mean,sparse_numeric-method
text: Computes mean underlying full vector (including implicit zeros) without coercing dense representation.

title: Mean of a sparse_numeric vector — mean,sparse_numeric-method
Mean of a sparse_numeric vector — mean,sparse_numeric-method
text: x sparse_numeric object. ... Ignored.

title: Mean of a sparse_numeric vector — mean,sparse_numeric-method
text: Numeric scalar mean.

title: Compute a vector norm — norm
text: Generic computing norms objects. sparse_numeric vector returns Euclidean (L2) norm \(sqrt(sum(x_i^2))\).

title: Compute a vector norm — norm
code: norm(x, ...)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric' norm(x, ...)

title: Compute a vector norm — norm
text: x Object compute norm . ... Ignored.

title: Compute a vector norm — norm
text: numeric scalar.

what: sparseNumeric: sparse numeric vector class and methods — sparseNumeric
title: sparseNumeric: sparse numeric vector class and methods — sparseNumeric
text: Implements S4 sparse numeric vector class methods arithmetic, plotting, computing means norms, standardizing vectors without materializing dense representations unless necessary.

title: sparseNumeric: sparse numeric vector class and methods — sparseNumeric
text: Maintainer: Mason Reed @example.com

what: Sparse numeric vector S4 class — sparse_numeric-class
title: Sparse numeric vector S4 class — sparse_numeric-class
text: sparse_numeric class stores mostly-zero numeric vector compressed form using non-zero values 1-based positions.

title: Sparse numeric vector S4 class — sparse_numeric-class
text: value Numeric vector non-zero values. pos Integer vector 1-based positions non-zero values. length Integer giving length underlying full vector.

title: Sparse arithmetic operations — sparse_ops
text: Generics methods implementing basic arithmetic sparse_numeric vectors.

title: Sparse arithmetic operations — sparse_ops
code: sparse_add(x, y, ...)  sparse_sub(x, y, ...)  sparse_mult(x, y, ...)  sparse_crossprod(x, y, ...)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' sparse_add(x, y, ...)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' sparse_sub(x, y, ...)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' sparse_mult(x, y, ...)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' sparse_crossprod(x, y, ...)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' e1 + e2  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' e1 - e2  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' e1 * e2

title: Sparse arithmetic operations — sparse_ops
text: x, y sparse_numeric objects. ... Ignored. e1, e2 sparse_numeric objects arithmetic operators (+, -, *).

title: Sparse arithmetic operations — sparse_ops
text: sparse_add(), sparse_sub(), sparse_mult() return sparse_numeric object. sparse_crossprod() returns numeric scalar (dot product).

title: Standardize an object — standardize
text: Generic create standardized version object. sparse_numeric vectors, centers scales underlying dense vector (including zeros) mean 0 sample standard deviation 1.

title: Standardize an object — standardize
code: standardize(x, ...)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric' standardize(x, ...)

title: Standardize an object — standardize
text: x Object standardize. ... Ignored.

title: Standardize an object — standardize
text: new sparse_numeric object sparse inputs.
